alert.note: Alert for Harris; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:02PM EDT until July 21 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Troup County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 302 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Baughs Crossroads, or 7 miles northeast of Lanett, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Southern Harbor, Cannonville, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Rocky Point, Piedmont Heights, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine Lake and Long Cane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
